item.title: Internet to Soothe the Savage Flyer
item.description:
Is there anything more frustrating than squeezing into the last seat on a long flight, stuck between grumpy passengers with hours to kill? You yearn for the distraction of emails or online games, but alas, internet access in the air seems like a distant dream. Fear not, weary traveler! The wait for in-flight WiFi is almost over. Major airlines are preparing to offer internet access on their planes, but it comes at a price...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/internet-to-soothe-the-savage-flyer/
